title: Actress Secret Lover - Novel Updates
tags: Accelerated Growth   Acting   Celebrities   Female Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Showbiz   System Administrator   Ugly to Beautiful
author: Xiao Jing Hu   小镜湖
description:
He is an immortal who was sealed in a ‘Star Talent Store’ for countless years.

For freedom, he turned an ordinary girl into the most popular star.

But he didn’t expect that he would fall in love with her,

And he eventually became her secret lover.

The question was: How could he go out to see the light?

She was an emerging female star who got popular overnight.

Her personal life had always been the focus of entertainment journalists.

Superstar? A big shot? A rising star?

When rumors were already flowing, she had a secret lover.

The question was: How could she get him out, to see the light?>
